xocs:funding-list.xocs:funding-text: This work was supported by the National Natural Science Foundation of China (61072098, 61072099) and Program for Changjiang Scholars and Innovative Research Team in University (IRT1005).

head.citation-title: Biquaternion cumulant-MUSIC for DOA estimation of noncircular signals
head.abstracts: Direction-of-arrival (DOA) estimation for noncircular sources is addressed within the hypercomplex framework utilizing fourth-order (FO) cumulants and a MUSIC-like estimator is proposed. Simulation results show the better performance of the proposed method compared to its complex counterpart in terms of both accuracy and robustness to model errors due to the stronger orthogonality in the biquaternion domain. © 2012 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
